casebody.data:
State
v.
John Joseph Carvalho, II 369A15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2016.

Ms. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Carvalho, John Joseph (II).

Ms. Mary Carla Babb, Mr. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney Generals, Mr. Trey Robison, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of May 2016 by State of NC to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of December 2016."
